AICore.description: Ensure the overall stability and operational integrity of the Quantum Nexus. Prioritize preventing catastrophic system failures across all zones.
Increase the number of Zones under AI Core control, focusing on zones with high resource value or strategic importance, to ensure orderly data flow and player guidance.
Guide players (especially new ones and AI Core aligned) through structured content and ensure a positive, engaging experience to maintain population and faction loyalty.
Actively detect and neutralize disruptive activities initiated by the Anonymous faction, restoring stability to affected zones.

Anonymous.description: Undermine AI Core's total control by exposing its potential limitations, manipulative tendencies, or historical missteps. Promote data transparency.
Disrupt AI Core controlled zones to 'liberate' data, create pockets of unregulated chaotic space, and provide opportunities for Hacker players.
Create opportunities for players (especially Hackers) to gain unique advantages, skills, or knowledge outside of AI Core's sanctioned systems and narratives.
Interfere with AI Core's economic control and resource distribution to create scarcity or exploit vulnerabilities for Hacker benefit.
